data.message: Real Friends Turn Into Family . Fake Friends Turn Into Enemies

replies.message: Old memoried and good friends are a great blessing.  I'm glad to call you my friend.

Real friends turn to Jesus . . .
Sometimes family is the enemy.
The Sword of the Spirit

The words of the Lord Jesus in Matthew 10:34-42 KJV
[34] Think not that I am come to send peace on earth: I came not to send peace, but a sword. (The  #SwordoftheSpirit which is the Word of Truth of God. Ephesians 6:17kjv) [35] For I am come to set a man at variance against his father, and the daughter against her mother, and the daughter in law against her mother in law. [36] And a man's foes shall be they of his own household. [37] He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me: and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me. [38] And he that taketh not his cross, and followeth after me, is not worthy of me. [39] He that findeth his life shall lose it: and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it. [40] He that receiveth you receiveth me, and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me. [41] He that receiveth a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet's reward; and he that receiveth a righteous man in the name of a righteous man shall receive a righteous man's reward. [42] And whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple, verily I say unto you, he shall in no wise lose his reward.
You 've got it.@Kwe Bz.Thank you for your explanation.
Not in my experience. Everyone turns against you eventually. I just don't bother anymore lol Happier alone
Yes  and one fake friend just did..really thought we were friends, he led me to think so..was I ever wrong.
Sometimes a family member can turn out to be your worst enemy.  Trust me, I've had to endure that.
Way to take a great upbeat meme and turn it into a pity party! Depressing bunch!
I hate when I think I have a friend and get thrown under the bus for new friend, that just goes to show I was never cosidered a friend.  That's Life!! @Janet Hofer I agree 100% better alone...
Steve Coulon...What ?  Leave that for church.

My friend,,big Marc, has always been my best friend,even though I haven't heard from him in some years, his mother was like my mother to me( bless her soul( R I P Marie!)) even fell in love with his younger sister at one point(always!)
